mapper.select: WITH recursive p AS ( SELECT cate_name, cate_code, cate_code_ref, 1 AS level FROM products_category WHERE products_category.cate_code_ref IS null UNION all SELECT pc.cate_name, pc.cate_code, pc.cate_code_ref, 1 + LEVEL AS level FROM products_category pc INNER JOIN p ON pc.cate_code_ref = p.cate_code ) SELECT cate_name, cate_code, cate_code_ref, level FROM p;
SELECT * from products ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT p.id , user_id ,name, p.cate_code, c.cate_code_ref, c.cate_name, price, stock, description, thumbnail, created_at FROM products p INNER JOIN products_category c ON p.cate_code = c.cate_code WHERE p.id = #{id};

SELECT p.id , user_id ,name, p.cate_code, c.cate_code_ref, c.cate_name, price, stock, description, thumbnail, created_at FROM products p INNER JOIN products_category c ON p.cate_code = c.cate_code ORDER BY created_at DESC ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products_image (product_id, file_name, upload_path, uuid) VALUES (#{product_id},#{file_name},#{upload_path},#{uuid});
